loosely in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends handles for both sizes holding 3 strands of yarn decrease attach strands at one side of bag with single_crochet chain 35 60 attach to other side of bag with single_crochet fasten_off and weave in all ends eyelash trim for both sizes 2 with size i hook working in free loops of round where color change was made and also in free loops of last round before slip st round attach strand of eyelash yarn with single_crochet in any stitch work one or two single_crochet in ea free loop around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends the tails may come loose in the felting process so weave them back in later shoulder bag option follow instructions for small bag but work in both loops on every round and omit eyelash trim for handle chain 125 instead of 35 felting instructions set washing machine to low water level hot water heavy duty agitation and add a drop or two of mild liquid soap such as ivory liquid place crocheted bag in washer along with old faded denim jeans to improve agitation let the machine agitate the bag for about 10 minutes then check to see how bag is felting do not let the water drain out or go to rinse cycle but continue to check every 5 minutes until bag has reached desired amount of felting sample bags took about 20 minutes to felt completely keep resetting machine to agitation cycle if necessary when bag is desired size remove from washer and rinse thoroughly in lukewarm water in sink press between dry towels to remove as much water as possible then lay flat on more dry towels and leave to dry completely trim loose strands and fluff up eyelash trim copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not
